description.text: Umbraco Web Application - An empty Umbraco CMS web application

name.text: Skips the automatic NuGet restore of the project on create
Optional: Specify the name of a package that this should be a test site for
Optional: The friendly name of the user for Umbraco login when using Unattended install
Optional: Email to use for Umbraco login when using Unattended install
Optional: Password to use for Umbraco login when using Unattended install
Optional: Database connection string when using Unattended install
Optional: Path to a custom view presented with the Umbraco installation contains no published content
Optional: Adds code to Startup.cs to redirect HTTP to HTTPS and enables the UseHttps setting.
